BibiCreator 01 documentation
modules | index

src.routing package¶

Submodules¶

src.routing.rest module¶

This module is for debugging reasons and will be deleted soon.

src.routing.rest.isAdmin()¶
src.routing.rest.testroute()¶

debugging stuff

src.routing.views module¶

This module lists all available flask routings for the user interface. These decorated functions deliver the user a rendered webpage with the help of html templates und the jinja2 templating engine.

src.routing.views.cloud_connection()¶

Admin only page for setting a new base image.

src.routing.views.createImage()¶

Routes the user to the assisted image creation page.

src.routing.views.history_overview()¶

Routes the user to the history overview page.

src.routing.views.homepage()¶

Either routes the user to the login page or to the default overview page.

src.routing.views.login_page()¶

Standard default log in page for authentication.

src.routing.views.logout()¶

Pops the session of the currently logged in user.

src.routing.views.manageModules()¶

Routes to the module manager. First it gathers all available modules for this user.

src.routing.views.playlistEditor(playlistID)¶

Lets users edit their playlists. First obtain playlist data from db.

Parameters:playlistID – The targeted playlist.
src.routing.views.playlists()¶

Renders the playlist overview page.

src.routing.views.resourceAndHealth()¶

Admin only page for checking the cpu and package health of the local machine.

src.routing.views.showHistoryByID(historyid)¶

Let the user inspect the history by a specific id.

Parameters:historyid – The desired history id.
src.routing.views.userManagement()¶

Admin only page for managing all users in bibicreator.

src.routing.views.user_settings()¶

Routes the user to page, where they can change their passwords.
